titles.title: To properly balance the wind and water erosion criteria and the wildlife suitability criteria to be used in the 18th signup of land in the conservation reserve program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/18/1999--Introduced. States that highly erodible lands that meet specified wind and water erosion criteria and have an established plant cover shall be deemed to meet specified wildlife criteria and receive maximum wildlife points with respect to conservation reserve signups.
